name: Dragon Quest Heroes: Rocket Slime
description:
The latest game from the creative minds behind the 2004 RPG hit, 'Dragon Quest VIII: Journey of the Cursed King™', has at last arrived with its spin-off release of 'Dragon Quest Heroes: Rocket Slime' on the Nintendo DS!

A fully fleshed out remake of its GBA ancestor, the hero of this brand new action-packed adventure is a boisterous slime named Rocket, a beloved fan-favorite mascot from the Dragon Quest series. Set forth on an adrenaline-fuelled journey as you liberate your slimy friends and family from the meddling grips of the platypunk, who came steamrolling with ginormous monster tanks to ransack your hometown!

Taking full advantage of the Nintendo DS' touch screen, bounce back with all your might as you launch yourself into colossal tank battles against your enemy, together with far-stretching landscapes for your protagonist to explore in search of his captured companions. Bring back what you uncover from your journeys to revitalize Boingburg, unlock several benefits, and continue to build upon your very own tank. Well? What are you dawdling around for? It's pay-back slime!
